p: The results of the FRAP assay, expressed in terms of EC 50 ( Table 2), showed that P. cubeba fruit’s essential oil has a powerful capacity ( p < 0.05) to reduce ferric ions to ferrous ions, with an EC 50 of 106.00 ± 0.11 μg/mL, which is three times higher than ascorbic acid, used as a standard (330.00 ± 0.60 μg/mL).
